properties.name: Attack, AoE, Movement, Travel, Physical, Melee

socketedItems.secDescrText: Charges at a targeted location or enemy, pushing away enemies in your path and repeatedly dealing off-hand damage in a small area in front of you. 100% more Damage with Hits at Maximum Charge Distance
